pages.narration: All the people spoke the same language and worked together. They traveled across the land until they found a wide plain and chose to settle there, building homes and starting new lives side by side.
The people decide to build a great city with a tower reaching high into the sky. They hope to make themselves famous and stay together instead of spreading across the world.
God sees the people growing proud and thinking only of themselves. To help them learn humility, He gives them different languages, and suddenly no one understands each other.
The people leave the unfinished city and spread out across the earth, traveling to many new lands. The tall tower remains behind as a reminder of what happened at Babel.
